roleset.name: to make personal

example.name: transitive
example.text: A few of the executives here for the fall meeting of the Business Council , a group that meets to discuss national issues , were only too happy to personalize their criticism .

propbank.arg: A few of the executives here for the fall meeting of the Business Council , a group that meets to discuss national issues

roleset.note: PERSONALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'personalize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from personalize.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: private, pertaining to an individual

example.name: arg1
example.text: I 'm posting anonymously because what I am going to say is very personal .

propbank.arg: what I am going to say

example.name: both args
example.text: the court held that the right to exploit one 's name and likeness is personal to the artist and must be exercised , if at all , by him during his lifetime .

propbank.arg: the right to exploit one 's name and likeness

roleset.note: PERSONAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from personal.01-j)
